title: Dondozo makes its big Pokémon GO debut during the Sunkissed Shores event!
summary: Monday, August 25, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, August 31, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time

title: Get codes for exclusive Timed Research during the 2025 Pokémon GO World Championships Twitch broadcast
summary: In addition to the upcoming Pokémon GO worldwide event and the live festivities taking place in Anaheim, California, we’re excited to share that Trainers will have the opportunity to get up to two codes for exclusive Timed Research by watching 30 minutes of the Pokémon GO Twitch live stream on Days 1 and 2 of the Pokémon GO World Championships!

title: Merciless Gauntlet Statistics
summary: The Merciless Gauntlet has concluded, congratulations to Ben_ for taking the top spot! It was a blast watching the action, so we've prepared some statistics from the event in today's news post. Check them out! Read More.

title: Past Mystery Box Microtransactions Weekend Sale
summary: This weekend, all cosmetic effects from the Sentinel, Kalandra, Sanctum, Crucible, Ancestor, Affliction and Necropolis Mystery Boxes as well as their variations are going on sale, so you can grab them at a discounted price! Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition Runners Up
summary: Earlier this week we announced the winners of our Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition Winners! Today, we'd like to announce and highlight more runners-up. Check them out! Read More.

summary: Sunday, September 14, 2025, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time

title: Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition Winners
summary: Our Secrets of the Atlas themed Fan Art Competition concluded last week. More than 150 Exiles submitted their art inspired by our latest Path of Exile expansion and its content. With the help of our art team, we’ve selected the winners and are now ready to announce them! Read More.

title: Merciless Gauntlet Highlights
summary: The Merciless Gauntlet started last week, and the top competitors are displaying unbelievable levels of skill. Zizaran and his team have put together a highlight reel of the event so far, which you can check out in today's news post. Read More.

title: Weekend Stash Tab Sale & Free Mystery Box When You Spend Points
summary: This weekend we’re running a Stash Tab Sale and offering a free Mystery Box when you spend points! You can view the full selection of discounted tabs here. Some of these tabs will work in both Path of Exile 1 and 2. Find out more in today's news post. Read More.

title: Celebrate the 2025 Pokémon World Championships in Pokémon GO!
summary: The 2025 Pokémon World Championships will take place from August 15 to 17, 2025, in Anaheim, California.

title: Zizaran’s Class Gauntlet Available on Consoles
summary: We’re once again partnering with Zizaran for another 10-day Class Gauntlet event which will start on July 31st PDT. For the first time ever, this event will also be available on consoles in a limited capacity. Check out the details in this news post. Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition Highlights
summary: Our Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition, where our community creates Fan Art inspired by content introduced in the Secrets of the Atlas expansion for prizes, is ending soon. Check out some of the submissions in today’s news post! Read More.

title: Second Boss Kill Event Winners
summary: All of the prizes for the rerun of the Secrets of the Atlas Boss Kill Event have now been claimed for PC and Consoles. Congratulations to all of the winners! Find out more in this news post! Read More.

title: Character, Portal, and Footprint Effects Weekend Sale
summary: We have a huge sale on Character, Portal and Footprint Effects this weekend! Take advantage of this opportunity to add the finishing touches to any stylised setup. Check out the full selection of discounted cosmetics here. Read More.

title: Developer Interviews - Zaccie, Game Designer
summary: In this episode of our Developer Interviews series, Eben talked to Zaccie, a Game Designer at Grinding Gear Games whose work focuses on monster balance. Check out the interview in today's news post! Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition Highlights
summary: Another week has flown by and entries for our Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition are flying in! The amazing artists from our community are creating pieces inspired by the Secrets of the Atlas expansion for prizes! Check out some highlights in today’s news post. Read More.

title: Patch 3.26.0e Preview
summary: We'll soon be releasing Patch 3.26.0e for Path of Exile, which contains a handful of improvements, including adjusting the location of the Recombinator in Kingsmarch, and numerous bugfixes. Check out a preview of the patch notes in today's news post! Read More.

title: Zizaran’s Class Gauntlet Event Starts on July 31st
summary: We’re once again partnering with Zizaran for another 10-day Class Gauntlet event which will start on July 31st PDT. Racers will need to endure some of the most challenging conditions Wraeclast can throw at them in order to survive the Merciless Gauntlet! Read More.

title: Hideout Showcase and Hideout Sale
summary: The horde of hideout homesteaders have handcrafted a heap of new hearty havens in Path of Exile 1! To aid aspiring architects, hideouts and decorations are on sale this weekend. Check out today's news post to find out more. Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Second Boss Kill Event
summary: Next Thursday, July 24th PDT, we’ll be hosting a second Boss Kill Event in Path of Exile where players can compete to kill the new Pinnacle Bosses from the Secrets of the Atlas expansion. The event will be available to our console players as well. The prize pool includes Godslayer’s Pride microtransactions and the opportunity to collaborate with our devs to create new Unique Items and Divination Cards. Find out more in this news post! Read More.

title: Pokémon GO Adventure Week returns, get out and explore!
summary: Tuesday, July 29, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, August 3, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time

title: Secrets of the Atlas Build Showcase
summary: It's already been one month since the launch of Secrets of the Atlas and there are some pretty neat builds popping up! While these builds may not shake up the meta, they certainly showcase a lot of creativity or in some cases take us down memory lane and revisit old favourites! Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Concept Art - Supporter Packs
summary: The launch of Secrets of the Atlas introduced two new series of supporter packs; the Cryptkeeper series and the Phrecian Magistrate series. Check out some of the concept art for these packs in today's news post. Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition Highlights
summary: Last week, we launched a Fan Art Competition themed around the Secrets of the Atlas expansion. We've gathered up some highlights from the submissions so far. Check them out in today's news post! Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Fan Art Competition
summary: It’s been a while since we’ve had a fan art competition for community artists, so we’re very excited to bring it back! We're launching a fan art competition themed around the Secrets of the Atlas expansion and everything introduced in it. The prize pool includes Path of Exile merchandise and in-game microtransactions. Find out more in this news post. Read More.

title: Happy 9th anniversary to Pokémon GO!
summary: Trainers,

title: Phishing Emails Warning
summary: Some players have recently reported that they're receiving phishing emails impersonating our Support team members. We would like to remind everyone to carefully check that the email address you are receiving emails from is support@grindinggear.com before replying, and to never click on any suspicious links without checking the link's location. Read More.

title: Development Stories - Who is the Originator?
summary: The world building and lore introduced in Secrets of the Atlas has set us up for expansions to come! We asked our Audio and Narrative Director Kane, to delve into some of the intricacies of piecing all of its components together. Check it out! Read More.

title: Mercenaries of Trarthus Statistics
summary: The Mercenaries of Trarthus have joined us for a few weeks now, and they've been a blast in more ways than one! In today's news post, we go over some fun and interesting stats related to the loot they've been hauling from Trarthus or looting from Wraeclast. Check it out! Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Concept Art - Bosses and Challenge Rewards
summary: Secrets of the Atlas features three new Pinnacle Bosses which you face in order to uncover the secrets of Caeserius family. In this expansion we have also introduced the exclusive Watchers’ Wrath Armour Set which you can earn by completing challenges in the league. For this news post we’ve gathered pieces of concept art for three new Pinnacles and the Armour Set. Check them out! Read More.

title: Secrets of the Atlas Original Soundtrack
summary: No expansion is complete without a soundtrack to set the tone, and the score for Path of Exile: Secrets of the Atlas certainly doesn't neglect this. Check out the tracks for the Secrets of the Atlas Original Soundtrack by Kamil Orman-Janowski and Michael James Collier in today's news post! Read More.

title: Pokémon GO and Major League Baseball knock it out of the park with a new partnership!
summary: Get ready to step up to the plate, Trainers–we’re excited to announce a partnership between Pokémon GO and Major League Baseball! During the 2025 season, all MLB ballparks will feature all-new, official club-branded PokéStops and Gyms so Trainers can play Pokémon GO from wherever they’re sitting in the ballpark. Trainers can also check out newly created Official Routes at the ballparks!
